title: Hilton Paris Opera still going strong!!!
text:
And I'm back at my second home in Paris: Hilton Paris Opera still is a great place to stay and I love coming back here. Service is still great and friendly. It's location is extremely convenient when you have to be all over Paris. The department stores are just around the corner. So no complaints!
Room Tip: All rooms are great, but I personally don't like having one of two interconnected rooms. See more room tips
